name: UIC Quad
description: This is the center of UIC East Campus and home to many events.

name: James Turrell Skyspace
description: This is part of the artists James Turrell's work. It is a freestanding structure that has an opening at the top that lets patrons view the sky.

name: Richard J. Daley Library
description: This is one of the Libraries at UIC that was named for a former Chicago mayor.
